languages.text: "Меня вела иная дорога, но ныне она слилась с твоей. И мой выбор продиктован не прихотью, но рассудком, который взывает к откровенности с {mf|тем|той}, кто может все исправить".

traits.locale_text: Не верила, но сейчас есть посерьезнее проблемы

languages.text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."
languages.original_text: "Меня вела иная дорога, но ныне она слилась с твоей. И мой выбор продиктован не прихотью, но рассудком, который взывает к откровенности с {mf|тем|той}, кто может все исправить".

traits.locale_text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."
"No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."
"No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."
"No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."

languages.text: 「我に他の道は開かれていなかった。だが、今、我らの道は重なっている。それに、我の決断は思いつきではなく、理性によるもの。この状況全てを正す力を持つ者に対して正直にあれ、と訴えているのだ」
languages.original_text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."

traits.locale_text: 「我に他の道は開かれていなかった。だが、今、我らの道は重なっている。それに、我の決断は思いつきではなく、理性によるもの。この状況全てを正す力を持つ者に対して正直にあれ、と訴えているのだ」

languages.text: “我当时并没有别的路可走，但现在，我们的道路是一致的。我的决定并不是出于一时兴起，而是理性考虑的结果。你有能力解决这所有的问题，我不得不对你坦诚相待。”
languages.original_text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."

traits.locale_text: “我当时并没有别的路可走，但现在，我们的道路是一致的。我的决定并不是出于一时兴起，而是理性考虑的结果。你有能力解决这所有的问题，我不得不对你坦诚相待。”

languages.text: «No había ningún otro camino abierto para mí, pero ahora el tuyo y el mío se han alineado. Mi decisión no está motivada por mero capricho, sino por la razón, que me impele ahora a ser sincera con la persona capaz de arreglar todo esto».
languages.original_text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."

traits.locale_text: «No había ningún otro camino abierto para mí, pero ahora el tuyo y el mío se han alineado. Mi decisión no está motivada por mero capricho, sino por la razón, que me impele ahora a ser sincera con la persona capaz de arreglar todo esto».

languages.text: "Mir stand kein anderer Pfad frei, doch nun sind unsere Pfade verbunden. Und meine Entscheidung beruhte nicht auf Willkür, sondern auf Vernunft, und deswegen will ich nun ehrlich zu der Person sein, die das alles in Ordnung bringen kann."
languages.original_text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."

traits.locale_text: "Mir stand kein anderer Pfad frei, doch nun sind unsere Pfade verbunden. Und meine Entscheidung beruhte nicht auf Willkür, sondern auf Vernunft, und deswegen will ich nun ehrlich zu der Person sein, die das alles in Ordnung bringen kann."

languages.text: « Aucune autre voie ne s'ouvrait à moi, mais à présent, ma voie et la vôtre se rejoignent. Ce n'est pas un simple caprice qui a motivé ma décision, mais la raison même, ce qui m'oblige à me montrer franche avec la personne capable de régler ce problème. »
languages.original_text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."

traits.locale_text: « Aucune autre voie ne s'ouvrait à moi, mais à présent, ma voie et la vôtre se rejoignent. Ce n'est pas un simple caprice qui a motivé ma décision, mais la raison même, ce qui m'oblige à me montrer franche avec la personne capable de régler ce problème. »

languages.text: "Önümde başka bir yol yoktu. Şimdiyse yollarımız kesişiyor. Bu kararımın sebebi bencillik değil, mantıktı. Aynı mantık şu an bana, bütün bunları düzeltebilecek tek kişiye karşı dürüst olmamı söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "No other path was open to me, but now our paths are aligned. And my decision was motivated not by caprice, but by reason, which compels me now to be honest with the person who can fix all of this."

traits.locale_text: "Önümde başka bir yol yoktu. Şimdiyse yollarımız kesişiyor. Bu kararımın sebebi bencillik değil, mantıktı. Aynı mantık şu an bana, bütün bunları düzeltebilecek tek kişiye karşı dürüst olmamı söylüyor."
